```{webr}
library(ggplot2)
theme_set(theme_bw())
library(patchwork)
library(broom)

data(trees)
trees$Diam <- trees$Girth / 12
trees$Girth <- NULL
head(trees)
```

```{webr}
gg_height <- ggplot(data = trees, aes(x = Height, y = Volume)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ poly(x, 2))

gg_diam <- ggplot(data = trees, aes(x = Diam, y = Volume)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ poly(x, 2))

gg_height + gg_diam
```


Change to code below to fit your own model!

```{webr}
base_lm <- lm(Volume ~ Diam + Height, data = trees)
poly_2 = lm(Volume ~ poly(Diam, 2) + poly(Height, 2), data = trees)

tidy(base_lm)

bind_rows(
    base = glance(base_lm),
    poly_2 = glance(poly_2),
    .id = "model"
)

par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
plot(base_lm)
```
